name: navigationController(_:animationControllerFor:from:to:)
desc: Called to allow the delegate to return a noninteractive animator object for use during view controller transitions.
declaration:
optional func navigationController(_ navigationController: UINavigationController, 
            animationControllerFor operation: UINavigationController.Operation, 
                              from fromVC: UIViewController, 
                                to toVC: UIViewController) -> UIViewControllerAnimatedTransitioning?
